name: Tales of Ancients
storyline:
Once a peaceful and quiet town... now lost in the shadows of silence and abandonment. This is the story of Alex—a man caught between the whispers of the rain and the fears hidden by the mist.

Alex's ordinary journey takes a mysterious turn when his car breaks down. As he stumbles upon an ancient temple complex deep within the forest, he unknowingly enters a forgotten, desolate town. What began as mere curiosity has now become a fight for survival.

While exploring the deserted streets, Alex finds an old book in an abandoned bookstore. The book reveals the secrets of ancient civilizations and mysterious cults. Following the trail of the enigmatic Nox Aeterna cult, each page pulls him deeper into the heart of the town's secrets. Every corner holds a puzzle, and every shadow hides a trap.
summary: Tales of Ancients is an atmospheric exploration game that tells the story of a man struggling to survive in a deserted town while tracing an ancient cult. In this world filled with heavy rain and mysterious rituals, you will uncover dark secrets.
